DOC.brief_summary: The study is a transversal, observational, descriptive survey of the practices and opinions of health professionals carried out nationally across France that aims to characterize children with cerebral palsy and pathological drooling and to describe care pathways, assessment and treatment of drooling.
DOC.brief_title: Management of Drooling in Children With Cerebral Palsy in France
DOC.criteria: health professional known to assess and/or treat drooling health professional known to assess and/or treat children with Cerebral Palsy health professional exercising in France health professional with an inactive email address
